title: Intermittent power-cuts today; no scheduled ones
content: Intermittent power-cuts are likely today (19), while the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has ruled out scheduled ones for the day.PUCSL chairman Janaka Ratnayake advise consumers to expect irregular interruptions between 2.00 pm and 6.00 pm to stabilize the national grid.He says the Ceylon Electricity Board has received fuel for todayâ€™s electricity generation.
